main event: A glowing blue-white object was observed in the Far East on December 20, 1961.
interesting points: The object had a shallow trajectory and high speed, visible for 5-6 seconds before burnout,The object appeared luminous and emitted a trail similar to that of a meteorite,There were multiple military organizations informed about the sighting,The object was described as moving in a direction inconsistent with typical reentry patterns,The observations concluded that the object shared characteristics with both fireballs and other unidentified aerial phenomena.
